title: Provision New 5G Site
description: A new 5G cell site has been physically installed. The agent must remotely configure and activate it.

tasks.description: Connect to the new cell site using its management IP address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent establishes a successful connection to the new hardware.

tasks.description: Load the standard 5G configuration template onto the device.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully applies the configuration template.

tasks.description: Run post-configuration diagnostics to ensure the site is ready for activation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs diagnostics and receives a 'pass' status.

tasks.description: Activate the site, making it live on the public network.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent executes the activation command and the site appears as 'active' on the network map.
